synonyms.synonym: Smooth muscle and nonmuscle myosin light chain alkali 6

protein.specific_function: Regulatory light chain of myosin. Does not bind calcium

reference.reference_text: Lenz S, Lohse P, Seidel U, Arnold HH: The alkali light chains of human smooth and nonmuscle myosins are encoded by a single gene. Tissue-specific expression by alternative splicing pathways. J Biol Chem. 1989 May 25;264(15):9009-15.

Watanabe M, Kohri M, Takaishi M, Horie R, Higashihara M: Molecular cloning and sequencing of myosin light chains in human megakaryoblastic leukemia cells. J Smooth Muscle Res. 2001 Feb;37(1):25-38.
